code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:71 yr old female retired c/o 2 days h/o mild epigastric pain. NKDA. o:Height 66 in, Weight 112 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
